meanings.definition: To be a perfect example of something.
meanings.sent1: Her kindness epitomizes what it means to be a good friend.
meanings.sent2: The majestic lion epitomizes strength and courage in the animal kingdom.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy penguin tried to epitomize grace by attempting ballet.
meanings.sent4: The old oak tree epitomizes resilience, standing tall through every storm.
meanings.sent5: The bright lighthouse on the cliff epitomizes hope for sailors in the night.

meanings.definition: To embody the essential characteristics of something.
meanings.sent1: His dedication to his craft epitomizes hard work and perseverance.
meanings.sent2: The ancient ruins epitomize the rich history of this land.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy tried to epitomize wisdom by wearing glasses.
meanings.sent4: The melody of the song epitomizes the emotions of a broken heart.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the painting epitomize the artist's passion and creativity.
